overview: This is a story about five friends – Tarapysh, Elsin, Mamyt, Aysal and Jusik. They live in the imagine village, named Koktom. Heroes’ life full of mysteries and adventures. Together they get over the difficulties, solve the problems, which they meet on their way.  Their friendship will be put to tests. They will have to do a choice between good and bad. But anyway they will hold true to each other and their ideals.
title: Beshtenek
